world package¶

Submodules¶

world.generateTilemap module¶

Generates the world tilemap Different loader called depending on the game version This ensures saves are backwards compatable

world.generateTilemap.load_0_0_1(tiledata) → arcade.sprite_list.SpriteList¶

Generator for dev version 0.0.1

Parameters

tiledata (list) – The tile list from the world save

Returns

List of sprites for easy drawing

Return type

arcade.SpriteList

world.generateTilemap.load_tilemap(save_version: str, tiledata: list) → arcade.sprite_list.SpriteList¶

Will return a sprite list of all tilemap entities

Parameters

  • save_version (str) – The version the save was made for compatability

  • tiledata (list) – The tile list from the world save

Returns

An arcade sprite list which can be draw to the screen

Return type

arcade.SpriteList

world.loadWorldData module¶

Methods for the loading and generation of the game data

world.loadWorldData.generate_new_world() → None¶

Makes a new worldSave.json file and populates it with defaults

world.loadWorldData.generate_passive() → list¶

Generates some passive mobs around the players spawn

Returns

list of the mob data

Return type

list

world.loadWorldData.generate_player() → dict¶

Generates new player data

Returns

Returns a dict of player data

Return type

dict

world.loadWorldData.generate_tilemap() → list¶

Generates the world terrain tilemap WIP so only returns grass for now

Returns

returns a 2d list of tile id’s

Return type

list

world.loadWorldData.load_data() → dict¶

Will read the world save or create a new one

Returns

A dictionary of the world save

Return type

dict

world.tiles_0_0_1 module¶

Stores the tile sprites for version: 0.0.1
